org.dotplot.image
Class QImageConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.image.QImageConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IConfiguration, IQImageConfiguration
public class QImageConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, IQImageConfiguration

Container for settings of the imaging module.

Author:
Tobias Gesellchen

Constructor Detail

QImageConfiguration

public QImageConfiguration()
Creates a new QImageConfiguration with default values.

QImageConfiguration

public QImageConfiguration(boolean isExportDotplot,
                           int exportFormat,
                           java.lang.String exportFilename,
                           boolean useLUT,
                           java.lang.String lutTitle,
                           java.awt.Color background,
                           java.awt.Color foreground,
                           int scaleMode,
                           boolean doScaleUp,
                           boolean showFileSeparators,
                           boolean useInformationMural)
Creates a basic configuration for the image module and uses the given settings.

Parameters:
isExportDotplot - shall the dotplot be exported?
exportFormat - desired export format
exportFilename - desired export filename
useLUT - use grayscaling/colors
lutTitle - title of the desired LUT
background - "background" of the LUT
foreground - "foreground" of the LUT
scaleMode - desired scaling mode
doScaleUp - scale up small images
showFileSeparators - option to show or hide the file separators
useInformationMural - option to use alternate algorithm

isOnlyExport

public boolean isOnlyExport()
Description copied from interface: IQImageConfiguration
If a plot is done from command line ("headless"), this will return true. For this case, e.g. no progress bar will be displayed.

Specified by:
isOnlyExport in interface IQImageConfiguration
Returns:
only do an export?
See Also:

getLutBackground

public java.awt.Color getLutBackground()
Description copied from interface: IQImageConfiguration
the user can set a background to change the current lut. this method will return the current setting in lut[x][0].

Specified by:
getLutBackground in interface IQImageConfiguration
Returns:

getLutForeground

public java.awt.Color getLutForeground()
Description copied from interface: IQImageConfiguration

Specified by:
getLutForeground in interface IQImageConfiguration
Returns:

See Also:

getScaleMode

public int getScaleMode()
Description copied from interface: IQImageConfiguration
returns the current setting for the scale mode. 0 means "no scaling", 1 means "scaling active".

Specified by:

the current scale mode

copy

public IConfiguration copy()
Description copied from interface: IConfiguration
Returns a copy of the Configuration.

The copy must be independent to the original, so that modifieing the copy does not affect the original.

Specified by:
copy in interface IConfiguration
Returns:
A copy of the Configuration.

serializedForm

public java.lang.String serializedForm()
                                throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Description copied from interface: IConfiguration
Returns the serialized form of the Configuration.

This statement must always be true:
configuration.equals(configuration.objectForm(configuration.serializedForm))) == true

Specified by:
serializedForm in interface IConfiguration
Returns:
The configuration in a serialized form.
Throws:
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the operation is not supported.
See Also:
IConfiguration.objectForm(String)

objectForm

public IConfiguration objectForm(java.lang.String serivalizedForm)
                          throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
Description copied from interface: IConfiguration
Creates an Configuration object of a serialized form.

This statement must always be true:
configuration.equals(configuration.objectForm(configuration.serializedForm))) == true

objectForm in interface IConfiguration
Parameters:

Returns:
